subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ふで}}
Shift in pronunciation from ''funde'' below.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Now the most common pronunciation in modern {{etyl|ja|-}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ふで}}

# a writing [[brush]], a painting brush, a [[pen]]
# [[writing]]:
## the [[act]] of [[writing]]
## something [[written]]
## [[handwriting]], how someone [[write]]s

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{m|en|pen}} sense is more commonly expressed using the {{etyl|en|-}}-derived term {{ja-r|ペン}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ふんで}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ふんで|obsolete}} same as for ''fude'' above: [[brush]]; [[pen]]; [[writing]]

subSections.title: Etymology 3
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ふみて}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ふみて|obsolete}} same as for ''fude'' above: [[brush]]; [[pen]]; [[writing]]

subSections.title: Etymology 4
Noun
